question: What is the disorder in which mutations in U4atac snRNA are detected?
ideal_answer: Mutations in U4atac snRNA are thought to be the cause of Microcephalic Osteodysplastic Primordial Dwarfism type I (MOPDI), a recessive form of developmental disorder.
